res_amber.name: Amber
res_amber.description: The hardened sap of the greenwood is sought after by Wood Elves, but all races know its value.

res_animals.name: Exotic Animals
res_animals.description: The hides and furs of creatures from across the Great Ocean fetch a hefty price.

res_dyes.name: Dyes
res_dyes.description: The creation of dyes to feed the burgeoning fashions of the courts of the Old World is a vibrant industry indeed.

res_empire_fort.name: Empire Fort
res_empire_fort.description: This location has a large garrison, but cannot have economic buildings.

res_fortress.name: Fortress Gate
res_fortress.description: This location has a large garrison, but cannot have economic buildings.

res_gems.name: Gemstones
res_gems.description: Gems hold great value for they are precious and prized, with only the occasional Daemon imprisoned within.

res_gold.name: Gold
res_gold.description: The presence of gold is a sign that a mine can be placed and the wealth it brings harvested.

res_gold_idols.name: Golden Idols
res_gold_idols.description: The wiser races are capable of sculpting gold into magnificent idols.

res_location_brt.name: Strategic Location
res_location_brt.description: This location is of special importance to Bretonnia.

res_location_brt_wef_hef.name: Strategic Location
res_location_brt_wef_hef.description: This location is of special importance to Bretonnia, High Elves and Wood Elves.

res_location_colony.name: Elven Colony
res_location_colony.description: This location is the site of an ancient High Elf colony. It increases income from ports.

res_location_def.name: Strategic Location
res_location_def.description: This location is of special importance to the Dark Elves.

res_location_dwf.name: Strategic Location
res_location_dwf.description: This location is of special importance to Dwarfs.

res_location_dwf_grn.name: Strategic Location
res_location_dwf_grn.description: This location is of special importance to Dwarfs and Greenskins.

res_location_dwf_grn_skv.name: Strategic Location
res_location_dwf_grn_skv.description: This location is of special importance to Dwarfs, Greenskins and Skaven.

res_location_dwf_skv.name: Strategic Location
res_location_dwf_skv.description: This location is of special importance to Dwarfs and Skaven.

res_location_emp.name: Strategic Location
res_location_emp.description: This location is of special importance to the Empire.

res_location_emp_brt.name: Strategic Location
res_location_emp_brt.description: This location is of special importance to the Empire and Bretonnia.

res_location_emp_grn.name: Strategic Location
res_location_emp_grn.description: This location is of special importance to the Empire and Greenskins.

res_location_emp_vmp.name: Strategic Location
res_location_emp_vmp.description: This location is of special importance to the Empire and the Vampire Counts.

res_location_emp_vmp_brt.name: Strategic Location
res_location_emp_vmp_brt.description: This location is of special importance to the Empire, Bretonnia, and the Vampire Counts.

res_location_generic.name: Strategic Location
res_location_generic.description: This location is of special importance.

res_location_grn.name: Strategic Location
res_location_grn.description: This location is of special importance to the Greenskin Tribes.

res_location_hef.name: Strategic Location
res_location_hef.description: This location is of special importance to the High Elves.

res_location_hef_def.name: Strategic Location
res_location_hef_def.description: This location is of special importance to the High Elves and Dark Elves.

res_location_hef_wef.name: Strategic Location
res_location_hef_wef.description: This location is of special importance to the High Elves and the Wood Elves.

res_location_lzd.name: Strategic Location
res_location_lzd.description: This location is of special importance to the Lizardmen.

res_location_natural_landmark.name: Natural Landmark
res_location_natural_landmark.description: This Location contains a natural landmark that cannot be demolished.

res_location_nor.name: Strategic Location
res_location_nor.description: This location is of special importance to the Norscans.

res_location_skv.name: Strategic Location
res_location_skv.description: This location is of special importance to the Skaven.

res_location_skv_lzd.name: Strategic Location
res_location_skv_lzd.description: This location is of special importance to the Skaven and Lizardmen.

res_location_teb.name: Strategic Location
res_location_teb.description: This location is of special importance to the Southern Realms.

res_location_tmb.name: Strategic Location
res_location_tmb.description: This location is of special importance to the Tomb Kings.

res_location_vmp.name: Strategic Location
res_location_vmp.description: This location is of special importance to the Vampire Counts.

res_location_vmp_arkhan.name: Strategic Location
res_location_vmp_arkhan.description: This location is of special importance to the Vampire Counts and the Followers of Nagash.

res_location_vmp_dwf_grn_skv_arkhan.name: Strategic Location
res_location_vmp_dwf_grn_skv_arkhan.description: This location is of special importance to Dwarfs, Greenskins, Skaven, Vampire Counts and the Followers of Nagash.

res_location_xef_emp_brt.name: Strategic Location
res_location_xef_emp_brt.description: This location is of special importance to the Empire, Elves and Bretonnia.

res_medicine.name: Medicinal Plants
res_medicine.description: Herbs and flora with medicinal properties are always valued by apothecaries.

res_obsidian.name: Carved Obsidian
res_obsidian.description: It takes an artisan to carve and fashion obsidian. Dark Elves are the true masters of this art, although others have produced fine pieces too.

res_ritual_currency.name: Vital Ritual Location
res_ritual_currency.description: This location contains many components deemed essential for rituals.

res_rom_furs.name: Furs
res_rom_furs.description: Fauna and game are worth hunting for both food and furs. Of course, in the Old World's forests, a hunter must be wary of becoming the hunted.

res_rom_glass.name: Dwarf Beer
res_rom_glass.description: Beer is incredibly important to Dwarfs and men alike, although the watery brews of the umgi are rightly shunned by thirsty Dawi.

res_rom_iron.name: Iron
res_rom_iron.description: Iron ore can be fashioned into many things, but in these lands it is mainly used for weapons. Of course, some races are better at metallurgy than others.

res_rom_lead.name: Salt
res_rom_lead.description: Salt can be taken from the sea or the mines. It is a useful commodity and not just a way for Halfling cooks to season meat.

res_rom_marble.name: Marble
res_rom_marble.description: Marble is a valuable and exotic material mainly used in grandstanding buildings, having great value within the nations of man.

res_rom_oil.name: Pastures
res_rom_oil.description: Pastures are rare places of peace for animals to graze, where farmers can tend to their herds and flocks.

res_rom_textiles.name: Pottery
res_rom_textiles.description: From clay comes ceramics that range from basic bowls to more delicate and extravagant items.

res_rom_timber.name: Timber
res_rom_timber.description: Wood is a flexible resource, used in anything from buildings to hand weapons. Just be careful which trees you take it from, as some won't take kindly to being felled.

res_rom_wine.name: Wine
res_rom_wine.description: While a High Elf would turn his nose up at it, Bretonnian wine is said to be the best - although the southern wineries of the Empire are now challenging its prominence.

res_savage.name: Savage Orcs
res_savage.description: This area is sacred to the Savage Orcs; at some point the Greenskins' tribal migration will bring them to this area.

res_spices.name: Spices
res_spices.description: The spices and seasonings sourced in far Cathay and Ind hold great value due to their rarity.

res_trinkets.name: Elven Trinkets
res_trinkets.description: Elven baubles lack the practicality of Dwarf-made items, but the finesse within makes then undeniably exquisite.
